aliases.displayName: Hold Account-Do Not Bill until Fixed

payload.name: Deferred Revenue Additions Product Level Discount
Third Party Deferred Revenue Additions Product Level Discount

revenueRecognitionRuleDtos.name: Recognize upon invoicing
revenueRecognitionRuleDtos.description: This rule recognizes revenue all at once on the day when the charge is invoiced or when an invoice item adjustment is made.

revenueRecognitionRuleDtos.name: Manual
revenueRecognitionRuleDtos.description: Manual recognition of revenue for PS services

revenueRecognitionRuleDtos.name: Recognize daily over time
revenueRecognitionRuleDtos.description: This rule recognizes revenue evenly over the invoice item service period using a daily recognition calculation.
